case_studies.project_full_description: Petting & Vetting in Egypt is growing by the day, We designed and branded VetCode a user friendly app to enhance both the pet owner and the vet’s experience.
We helped in creating Foodpage’s brand identity and designed it's application to be a simple and unique in the ever growing market of online food ordering.
We are proud to be the ones who revamped ACCM’s website to make it easier to navigate and to have higher traffic
Revamping new frontier website and logo was a big challenge; yet here we go the website now is having better presence and much easier website navigation.

testimonial.feedback: Addicta team capable to transform my business requirements into an intuitive user experience design.
Fixed solutions company was pleased to deal with Addicta as the company has provided lots of high-quality UX/UI services in a highly mannered timing through such a creative and talented team.
Addicta is a trustworthy company, I like to work with them.

testimonial.person_description: Technical Support Section Head at ASCOM
testimonial.feedback: They have a good reaction towards everything including the situations that you hold no responsibility for, they receive and accept feedback really well, they are cooperative and make things easier for everyone.

full_services.title: Branding
full_services.description: Your Successful product needs a well presented branding to convey your customers to use and buy your services.
full_services.Deliverables: Logo concepts, StyleGuide, Design System and Moodboards.

full_services.title: UX Strategy
full_services.description: If you find it hard to imagine your business transforming into the digitized era, how to breakdown your business solutions into phases, we are ready to provide you with the UX strategy tailored to your needs.
full_services.Deliverables: Strategy consultation, Ideation session, identifying business goals, writing business requirement document (BRD).

full_services.title: UX Research
full_services.description: Hypothesis is not always the right thing to do, we help you to validate your hypothesis and requirements with users’ needs and competitors in the same field to achieve a successful product.
full_services.Deliverables: Competitive Analysis, User Research, defined Personas and User scenarios.

full_services.title: UX Design
full_services.description: Structuring and labeling content and designing usable high fidelity wireframes, helps you to visualize imagine your digital product.

full_services.title: UI Design
full_services.description: Designing a colored authentic design and simulate it in interactive mockups can help you to have a stunning demo or pitch deck in front of your investors.
full_services.Deliverables: Visual UI Design, interactive mockups, micro interaction / animation and creating assets for developers.

full_services.title: Development
full_services.description: From an interactive prototype to a real live product, we help you to develop your digital product.
full_services.Deliverables: Front-end Development, Mobile Development and Backend Development.

full_services.title: Testing & Reports
full_services.description: After launching your digital solution we will make sure that your product is in the right direction by testing and taking reviews from your users.
full_services.Deliverables: Usability testing, Recorded user’s behaviors, Conversion funnel, survey and Development support.

banner.text: Petting & Vetting in Egypt is growing by the day, we designed and branded VetCode a user-friendly app to enhance both the pet owner and the vet’s experience.

about.title: Exploring new fields!
about.text: VetCode is a Mobile technology startup that is specialized in pets' care services in Cairo. Our main challenge was designing an authentic brand and stellar user experience to enhance the veterinary market experience in Egypt.

brand.title: Trendy Branding
brand.text: Vetcode was injected in the  emerging VET market and is relatively  a brand new business model accordingly we opted for a trendy logo in concept and in colors to match market needs.

wireframe.title: Sketches, Wireframes and Ideation
wireframe.text: We practised agile techniques through multiple meetings and iterations with our client to sketch and design wireframe features to meet the set business goals and user needs.

interactions.title: UI Design & Micro Interactions
interactions.text: Designing an authentic and visual mobile application was challenging as it had catchy onboarding animation and reliable at the same time.

feature.title: My Pets
feature.text: Your dedicated pet profile and medical records.

feature.title: Vet Care
feature.text: Home-Care veterinary, grooming and training services.

feature.title: Pet Shop
feature.text: Adoption, mating, selling, buying, lost and found services.

commercial.title: Commercial Website
commercial.text: We wanted only one page to show how we could merge professionalism and reliable mobile features together.

section.title: Let's Go Viral!
section.text: We were given the opportunity to establish a targeted commercial advertisement for two audiences; Pet owners and veterinarians.

testemony.title: “Addicta team capable to transform my business requirements into an intuitive user experience design.”
testemony.subtitle: Dr. Ahmed El-Badawy

banner.text: We designed foodpage to be a simple and unique mobile application in the ever-growing market of online food ordering.

about.title: Design Challenge
about.text: Foodpage is food ordering and doorstep delivery app. The tough competition in the online food-ordering market, the tight schedule and not being provided much information about the users’ needs made our mission in creating a friendly mobile app and designing strong brand presence a challenging.

brand.title: Brand Identity
brand.text: We have proposed 3 different logo design concepts, each concept has its own uniqueness.

wireframe.title: Sketches and wireframes
wireframe.text: We have worked on sketches and design high fidelity wireframes in parallel.

features.title: Visual Design and Features
features.text: Designing an authentic visual design in an interactive mockup

feature.title: Discovery
feature.text: sers can discover a wide variety of restaurants and eateries that have discounts and offers, they might as well filter them by areas and cuisines.

feature.title: Multi-order
feature.text: User can order different meals from different places at the same time and have them delivered to doorstep within a convenient ETA.

feature.title: Collective Orders
feature.text: User can schedule order for a specific time and have it delivered on time.

social.title: Launching the App and Social Activities
social.text: Application is now live, we have worked in some social media management, design posts and creating ads videos.

download.title: The application is available for IOS and Android

banner.text: We are proud to be the ones who revamped and redesign ACCM’s website to make it easier in navigation and to have a higher impact in Geology & mining field.

about.title: The Story of Challenge
about.text: New frontier is a leading global IT services company in the Middle East. They had a total renovation as they had their brand identity renovated and their website revamped. Now new frontiers is enjoying a brand new appearance and it can strongly compete with other IT competitors in the Middle East.

brand.title: Brand Identity
brand.text: We designed 3 different logo design concepts, each one of them had its own authenticity.

brand2.text: and finally they chose the 2nd one, we have designed stationary and company profile.

sitemap.title: Sitemap & Visual Design
sitemap.text: In spite of being expedited to launch the website and not having enough time to do any wireframes, we managed to structure the whole sitemap using sketches and then we immediately started visual designing.

download.title: Launching the App and Social Activities
download.text: We developed a responsive website that operates on tablets, desktops and mobiles using wordpress for backend development, now New frontiers’ website is enjoying new presence and it can strongly compete with other IT competitors in the Middle East.

testemony.title: “Addicta is a trustworthy company, I like to work with them.”
testemony.subtitle: Eng. Amr Watar

banner.text: From Old Classic Education center website to a new trendy website design, CLS has a better look and can compete strongly in education field.

about.title: Challenge
about.text: CLS learning solution is leading the technology learning market in Egypt, Middle East and Africa. The main challenge we faced was designing a straightforward and easy-navigation website in spite of the complicated data of the courses and learning paths and simultaneously maintain an outstanding visual design.

brand.title: Information Architecture (IA)
brand.text: The amount of data we received helped us to start immediately in doing information architecture activity, structuring, labeling and prioritizing content and navigation.

brand2.title: Flows, Sketches and Design wireframes
brand2.text: We identified user flows, sketched concept and designed high fidelity wireframes. Once we received approval on the concept we finalized the whole wireframes flows.

sitemap.title: Visual Design and Development
sitemap.text: After finalizing high fidelity wireframes, we did CLS UI design concept. Developing a dynamic website without affecting the UI design was challenging however following an agile module easily solved that by having the UI designer and developer collaborate with each other.

download.title: Launching it wasn’t easy in CLS
download.text: It wasn’t easy to launch CLS website, we did a lot of feedback rounds to make sure that user will have a different and great learning experience on CLS website.

banner.text: Changing people’s lifestyle by delivering ready-made healthy nutrition drinks.

warning.text: Note: This project is still under development. Stay tuned for final photos and previews of the application and the website after launching.

about.title: Altering lifestyles!
about.text: Daily needs is a mobile application that serves multiple healthy nutrition products, such as vegetables, cold pressed juices, detox programs, soaked drinks and plant milk.

brand.title: Design thinking and Competitive Research
brand.text: We brainstormed, gathered requirements and ideated on how we can persuade unhealthy people to change their lifestyles and to buy Daily Needs’ products. Based on that we sketched, emphasized personas and structured information architecture.

brand2.text: We listed and studied all potential competitors locally and globally before proceeding with the design implementation.

freshBrand.title: Fresh Branding
freshBrand.text: We proposed a wide variety of trendy branding logos and styles, and daily needs owners approved the freshest and neatest logo design.

wireframe.title: User Stories and Wireframes
wireframe.text: After brainstorming and market studies, we listed user stores and designed mobile wireframes.

features.title: Mobile UI Design
features.text: Created a lively app to encourage people to change their lifestyle to healthier, hygienic and nutritious.

feature.title: Discovery
feature.text: At a glance users can explore daily needs categories, products and programs along with reading related articles and watching nutrition videos

feature.title: Categories
feature.text: Daily needs has a large variety of products that we named and categorized to users' convenience.

feature.title: Orders
feature.text: Orders can be tracked easily and scheduled as well to be delivered on a specific date and time.

download.title: Delivering Project
download.text: The project still under development and we have finished UX and UI Design, soon we will launch IOS, Android mob app and eCommerce website.

banner.text: ACCM’s website was revamped/ restyled from an old low impact website to a new attractive, UI designed website with more influence in the geology and mining field.

about.title: Challenge
about.text: ACCM is a subsidiary of ASEC for mining, a pioneer in the domain of mining and geology for over 25 years in Egypt and in the MENA area. They aimed to have higher impact in the calcium carbonate market in the Middle East and in Egypt they had only one requirement is to have a supreme and incomparable website.

commercial.title: Sitemap & Visual Design
commercial.text: Knowing users’ needs was a critical detail for a commercial website that wasn’t provided due to the tight schedule. So, we started immediately with sitemap structuring, sketching and then dove into UI design.

download.title: Launching website
download.text: Now ACCM is live having their elegant website presence and they can convey their messages to Middle East and Far East.
